sentences.en: A generalized morphological transform based on the set cardinality was presented.
sentences.cn: 摘要提出了一种基于集合势的广义形态变换形式.

sentences.en: Cell morphological observation showed that Galla Chinesis has obvious influence on fibroblast.
sentences.cn: 细胞形态学观察结果可见五倍子对成纤维细胞具有明显的影响.

sentences.en: Correlation of morphological factors with injury is important.
sentences.cn: 形态因素与受害的相互关系很重要.

sentences.en: Fetal NRBCs show unique morphological characteristics and haemoglobin phenotype.
sentences.cn: 胎儿NRBC具有鲜明的形态学、免疫学特征.

sentences.en: It involves morphological filament, physiological low metabolism but active movement.
sentences.cn: 细菌的变化包括菌体纤细化, 生理上代谢低下,但是运动活泼.

sentences.en: Many cultivated plants can produce some phytoliths which have special morphological characteristics.
sentences.cn: 许多栽培植物能够产生具属种一级鉴定特征的植物硅酸体.

sentences.en: Many scientists agree that the domestic dog displays more morphological variation than any other known species, thanks to selective breeding by humans.
sentences.cn: 许多科学家都认为，国内的狗更显示形态比任何其他已知的物种变异，人类有选择育种的感谢。

sentences.en: Morphological evaluation was on renal size, cortical thickness, and corticomedullary differentiation ( CMD ) .
sentences.cn: 形态学评估包括肾脏大小 、 皮质厚度及皮髓质 分界.

sentences.en: MORPHOLOGICAL STRUCTURE OF THE RESPIRATORY SYSTEM OF HYDROPHIS CYANOCINCTUS ( DAUDIN ) ( REPTILIA : HYDROPHIIDAE )
sentences.cn: 青环海蛇呼吸系统的形态结构 ( 爬行纲: 海蛇科 )

sentences.en: Morphological terminology was adopted principally from Zhang ( 1990 ) and Evans ( 1947 ).
sentences.cn: 形态术语基本遵从张雅林 ( 1990 ) 和Evans ( 1947 ) 的定义.

sentences.en: Non - morphological criteria of metastasizing potential are largely speculative.
sentences.cn: 非 形态学的转移潜力的指标大部分是随机性的.

sentences.en: Objective To enrich the morphological basis for anthropology and clinical cosmetology.
sentences.cn: 摘要目的为临床下肢美容术及人类形态学积累资料.

sentences.en: Objective To provide morphological information for the research of lesser splanchnic nerve.
sentences.cn: 目的为内脏小神经研究提供形态学基础.

sentences.en: Other morphological features have also been identified that are inconsistent with a bird-from-dinosaur theory.
sentences.cn: 其他的形态学特征也被认为与鸟类自恐龙演化的理论不一致。

sentences.en: The cultivated soybean is an erect, bushy annual plant of great morphological diversity.
sentences.cn: 栽培大豆是一种直立 、 丛生、形态变化很大的一年生植物.

sentences.en: The morphological characteristics, biological characteristics and adaptability of caper spurge are reported.
sentences.cn: 报道了引进的能源植物黄鼠树的形态特征 、 生物学特性以及在引种地的适应性.

sentences.en: They then undergo further morphological changes into swollen and irregularly shaped organisms.
sentences.cn: 然后它们在肿胀的、形状不规则的根部进一步发生形态上的变化.

words.tran_cn: 形态学，形态论；[语] 词法，[语] 词态学
